text: hying michu læa chay michu phwk cea cng boy tæla khnnı sxng khn nan khnla hnung rxy thi læa xya hı khwam sngsar yabyang kark ra tha khxng phwk cea tx khn thang sxng nan nı bayyati khx ngxallxhˌ penxankhad hak phwk cea sraththa tx xallxhˌ læa wan prlok læa cng hı klum hnung khxng brrda phu sraththa pen phyan nı kar lngthosʹ khea thang sxng
